price: “Ba bandi bakora ubwononnyi ku isi kandi ntibagire ibyo batunganya.”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
